questions.question: 10 V is applied to two 5 ohm resistors in series. The resulting current is

explanations.a: Too high; would require only 5Ω total resistance.
explanations.c: Correct. Total resistance = 5Ω + 5Ω = 10Ω, I = V/R = 10/10 = 1 A.

questions.question: 10 V is applied to two 5 ohm resistors connected in parallel. The resulting current is

explanations.d: Too low; this is for higher resistance.

questions.question: 6V is applied to a 2 ohm resistor in series with two 2 ohm resistors connected in parallel. The current through the first resistor is

explanations.b: Correct. Parallel of 2Ω & 2Ω = 1Ω. Total = 2Ω + 1Ω = 3Ω. I = 6/3 = 2 A.

questions.question: One complete set of negative and positive values of alternating quantities is called

explanations.a: Incorrect. Time period is the duration of one cycle, not the cycle itself.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Amplitude is the maximum value, not a full set.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Frequency is the number of cycles per second.
explanations.d: Correct. One complete set is defined as a cycle.

questions.question: The power factor in a LCR circuit at resonance is

explanations.a: Incorrect. At resonance, power factor is maximum, not zero.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Value too low for resonance condition.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Resonant circuits have unity power factor.
explanations.d: Correct. At resonance, impedance is purely resistive → PF = 1.
